comment: What kinda pervert does it take to sit there, clap for his lies and still support communist candidates agendas? Must Get Out And Vote Republican in just a couple of weeks. Vote Early!

# ::snt What kinda pervert does it take to sit there, clap for his lies and still support communist candidates agendas? Must Get Out And Vote Republican in just a couple of weeks. Vote Early!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / take-10
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (s / sit-01
                        :ARG1 (p / person
                              :ARG1-of (p2 / pervert-01)
                              :mod (k / kind
                                    :mod (a2 / amr-unknown)))
                        :ARG2 (t2 / there))
                  :op2 (c / clap-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 (a3 / agenda
                              :poss (c2 / candidate
                                    :mod (p3 / political-movement
                                          :name (n / name
                                                :op1 "communism")))))
                  :op3 (s2 / support-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 a3
                        :mod (s3 / still))))
      :snt2 (o / obligate-01
            :ARG2 (a4 / and
                  :op1 (g / get-05
                        :ARG2 (o2 / out))
                  :op2 (v / vote-01
                        :ARG0 (y / you)
                        :ARG1 (p4 / political-party
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Republican"
                                    :op2 "Party"))
                        :time (a5 / after
                              :op1 (n3 / now)
                              :quant (c3 / couple
                                    :op1 (t3 / temporal-quantity
                                          :quant 1
                                          :unit (w / week))
                                    :mod (j / just))))))
      :snt3 (v2 / vote-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 y
            :time (e / early)))
